summary: Documentary about the life of avant-garde filmmaker Maya Deren, who led the independent film movement of the 1940s.
cast: Miriam Arsham|Stan Brakhage|Chao Li Chi|Rita Christiani|Maya Deren|Katherine Dunham|Graeme Ferguson|Alexander Hammid|Teiji Ito|Judith Malina|Jonas Mekas|André Pierre|Amos Vogel
title: Im Spiegel der Maya Deren
